letter-received.header: Have you received a letter from the Home Office?

list.one: your application to stay in the UK was successful
list.two: your biometric residence permit (BRP) is going to be delivered

letter-received.date-question: What is the date on the letter?

para.one: We need to know the date on your letter to find your BRP. If you haven't yet received a letter, the Home Office may still be processing your application.
para.two: If you think you should have received the letter by now, or you no longer have your letter, contact UK Visas and Immigration.

para.one: We need to know the date on your letter to find your BRP. If you haven't yet received a letter, the Home Office may still be processing your application.
para.two: If you think you should have received the letter by now, or you no longer have your letter, contact UK Visas and Immigration.

on-the-way.header: Your biometric residence permit should be on the way

one.second: working days since the letter from the Home Office letter saying your application to remain in the UK was successful.

two.second: working days, and if you still have not received your BRP, use this form to contact us.

contact-details.header: How should we contact you about your BRP?

address.title: Tell us your address so that we can contact you by post.

contact-details.delay: Asking to be contacted by post will add a further 2 days on to our response time. If you provide an email address we can get back to you sooner.

uk-address.header: Do you have an UK address where we can send the BRP?

address.title: If needed, we will send a correct BRP to this address.

same-address.header: Did you expect your BRP to be delivered to the same address as the one on the letter from the Home Office?

address.title: Tell us the address and we will organise another delivery.

personal-details.subheader: We need these details to review the problem with your BRP.

check-details.header: Check the details you have provided
check-details.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

headers.no-letter: You do not have the delivery letter

org-help.title: Are you completing this form on behalf of the BRP holder?
org-help.explanation: Friends, relatives, employers, charity workers and lawyers, for example, can complete this form on behalf of the BRP holder.

check-details-error.header: Check the details you have provided
check-details-error.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you provided to

para.one: Our staff will review the information you have sent and speak with the courier if necessary to find out why your BRP hasn't yet arrived.
para.two: As each BRP delivery is tracked, we will be able to find your BRP and arrange redelivery. If you are expecting multiple BRPs to be delivered but they havenâ€™t arrived, you must report each undelivered BRP separately.
para.three: We shall be in touch with you as soon as possible. During very busy periods this can take up to 5 working days, or slightly longer if you didn't provide an email address.

para.one: If you provided an email address, you should hear from us in the next working day, We will tell you if you need to apply for a replacement BRP.
If you provided an email address, we will contact you in the next working day to tell you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK, you may need to apply for a temporary visa to get back to the UK.
para.three: We will tell you if you need to apply for a temporary visa when we contact you.
